pageContext.claim: “And we've gone up tremendously in value as a country, in economic value. Tremendously. Larry, we've gone up what -- $11 trillion, $14 trillion? And China has gone down close to $20 trillion.”
pageContext.analysis: China's economy keeps growing, though not at the same rapid pace. Anyway, the market capitalization of the top U.S. companies is not necessarily an indicator of wealth gains for the general population.
